title: IP Boosts Appearing
body:
Hi, I've been playing ARAMs and it has been saying that I have been getting extra IP due to an IP boosts, but no one used a skin boost, and I did not purchase an IP boost pack.

I was just wondering where it was coming from, and if it is a bug or not. Thanks.

replies.body:
We're at the beginning of a [**double IP weekend**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions) ^_^!!! From now until midnight April 23rd (Pacific Time) you'll be able to earn much more IP than normal!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
